metadata.title: CVE-2024-27026 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:vmxnet3: Fix missing reserved tailroom Use rbi->len instead of rcd->len fornon-dataring packet. Found issue: XDP_WARN:xdp_update_frame_from_buff(line:278): Driver BUG: missing reserved tailroomWARNING: CPU: 0 PID: 0 at net/core/xdp.c:586 xdp_warn+0xf/0x20 CPU: 0 PID:0 Comm: swapper/0 Tainted: G W O 6.5.1 #1 RIP: 0010:xdp_warn+0xf/0x20 ... ?xdp_warn+0xf/0x20 xdp_do_redirect+0x15f/0x1c0 vmxnet3_run_xdp+0x17a/0x400[vmxnet3] vmxnet3_process_xdp+0xe4/0x760 [vmxnet3] ?vmxnet3_tq_tx_complete.isra.0+0x21e/0x2c0 [vmxnet3]vmxnet3_rq_rx_complete+0x7ad/0x1120 [vmxnet3]vmxnet3_poll_rx_only+0x2d/0xa0 [vmxnet3] __napi_poll+0x20/0x180net_rx_action+0x177/0x390

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-27026` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic - 6.2.0-20.20
linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic-lpae - 6.2.0-20.20
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic - 6.2.0-20.20
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic-64k - 6.2.0-20.20
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-aws - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-azure - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1005-gcp - 6.2.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1003-laptop - 6.5.0-1003.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-lowlatency - 6.2.0-1003.3
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-lowlatency-64k - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-oracle - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-6.2.0-1004-raspi - 6.2.0-1004.5
linux-image-6.2.0-1004-raspi-nolpae - 6.2.0-1004.5
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1002-starfive - 6.5.0-1002.3
No subscription required

linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support').
